accuracy.of: AEN - Glo Ve w / o LSR

Comparing the results of.from sentence: Comparing the results of AEN - GloVe and AEN - Glo Ve w / o LSR , we observe that the accuracy of AEN - Glo Ve w / o LSR drops significantly on all three datasets .

over all performance.from sentence: The over all performance of AEN - GloVe and AEN - Glo Ve - BiLSTM is relatively close , AEN - Glo Ve performs better on the Restaurant dataset .

AEN - Glo Ve.from sentence: More importantly , AEN - Glo Ve has fewer parameters and is easier to parallelize .

AEN - Glo Ve 's lightweight level.from sentence: AEN - Glo Ve 's lightweight level ranks second , since it takes some more parameters than MemNet in modeling hidden states of sequences .

model size.from sentence: As a comparison , the model size of AEN - Glo Ve - BiLSTM is more than twice that of AEN - GloVe , but does not bring any performance improvements .
